scripts.source: docker compose -f=.local/docker-compose.yml build blinkfile-source && docker compose -f=.local/docker-compose.yml run --rm blinkfile-source
scripts.host:install: go mod download && cd app/web && npm i && cd ../..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:git && npm run lint:app && npm run lint:acceptance-tests
scripts.lint:app: npm run source && npm run golangci-lint -- run -v
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:acceptance
scripts.test:unit: npm run source && npm run go:test
scripts.test:acceptance: npm run build && npm run acceptance-test:build && npm run acceptance-test:up && npm run acceptance-test:down
scripts.serve: docker compose -f=.local/docker-compose.yml build blinkfile && docker compose -f=.local/docker-compose.yml run -p=8020:8020 -e=PORT=8020 --rm blinkfile
scripts.hugo: docker compose -f=.local/docker-compose.yml build blinkfile-hugo && docker compose -f=.local/docker-compose.yml run -p=8021:8021 --rm blinkfile-hugo
scripts.go:test: docker compose -f=.local/docker-compose.yml build blinkfile-unit-test && docker compose -f=.local/docker-compose.yml run --rm blinkfile-unit-test
scripts.cypress:lint: cd test/cypress && npm run test:lint && cd ../..
scripts.cypress:run: cd test/cypress && npm run test && cd ../..
scripts.cypress:open: cd test/cypress && npm run test:open && cd ../..
